static vector<int>& rmadd ( vector< int > &  arr,
int  numb,
bool  negate 
) [inline, static]

Adds or removes the element into the array.

Adds or removes the element numb to/from the array depending on negation.

Parameters:
arrThe array to be updated.
numbThe element to be added/removed to/from the array.
negateIf true then removes, if false then adds to the array.
Returns:
Updated array.
